subject: Baseball
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Patrick Schuster, a Florida high school senior with a 90-mile-an-hour fastball and a nasty slider and curve, will try for his fifth consecutive no-hitter Tuesday.
snippet: Patrick Schuster, a Florida high school senior with a 90-mile-an-hour fastball and a nasty slider and curve, will try for his fifth consecutive no-hitter Tuesday.
